activeMsg: Microclimate Tools for VSCode are active!
failedToReconnect: Couldn't reconnect to Microclimate at {{- uri }}. Try re-creating the connection.
versionChanged: Microclimate at {{- uri }} was previously version {{ oldVersion }}, but is now {{ newVersion }}.

command.noContainerForShell: {{ projectName }} does not have an application container running. Wait until the project is Running.
command.alreadyInSelectedFolder: The selected folder is already your workspace root.
command.confirmDeleteProjectMsg: Are you sure you want to delete {{ projectName }} in Microclimate, and from your filesystem?
command.projectAlreadyBuilding: {{ projectName }} is already building. Build request cancelled.
command.explicitBuildNotNecessary: {{ projectName }} has auto-build enabled. There is no need to request a build.
command.seeProblemsView: See the Problems view for details.

cmdResourcePrompt.noProjToRunOn: There is no Microclimate project to run this command on.
cmdResourcePrompt.noProjToRunOnWithStates: There is no {{ states }} Microclimate project to run this command on.
cmdResourcePrompt.noConnToRunOn: There is no Microclimate connection to run this command on.
cmdResourcePrompt.noConnOrProjToRunOn: There is no Microclimate connection or project to run this command on.
cmdResourcePrompt.noConnOrProjToRunOnWithStates: There is no Microclimate connection, or {{ states }} project, to run this command on.

debug.didNotConnectInTime: Debugger did not attach within {{ timeoutS }}s.
debug.failedToAttach: Failed to attach debugger to {{ projectName }}.
debug.failedToAttachWithUrl: Failed to attach debugger to {{ projectName }} at {{- debugUrl }}.
debug.noDebugTypeKnown: No debug type available for project of type {{ type }}.
debug.noDebugPort: No debug port set for project {{ projectName }}.
debug.maybeAlreadyDebugging: Are you already debugging this project?
debug.debuggerAttachSuccess: Debugger attached to {{ projectName }} at {{- debugUrl }}.
debug.waitingBeforeDebugAttachStatusMsg: Waiting before attaching debugger to {{ projectName }}

logs.waitingForAppLogs: Waiting for Microclimate to send application logs for {{ projectName }}...
logs.logNotUpdatingNoConnection: ******** The connection to Microclimate was lost, so this {{ logType }} log is no longer updating.
logs.logNotUpdatingOther: ******** This {{ logType }} log is no longer updating.
logs.noLogsToHide: There are no Microclimate logs open.

newConnectionCmd.enterMicroclimateHost: Enter the hostname or IP for the Microclimate instance you want to connect to.
newConnectionCmd.enterMicroclimatePort: Enter the Port for the local Microclimate instance you want to connect to.
newConnectionCmd.invalidPortNumber: Invalid port "{{ port }}". Port must be an integer between 1024 and 65536.
newConnectionCmd.connectionSucceeded: New connection to {{- connectionUri }} succeeded. Workspace path is: {{- workspacePath }}.
newConnectionCmd.connectFailed: Connecting to Microclimate at {{- uri }} failed.
newConnectionCmd.versionNotProvided: Your version of Microclimate is not supported. At least {{ requiredVersion }} is required.
newConnectionCmd.versionNotRecognized: Could not determine your Microclimate version. The server is running version "{{ rawVersion }}". At least {{ requiredVersion }} is required.
newConnectionCmd.versionTooOld: You are running Microclimate version {{ rawVersion }}, but at least {{ requiredVersion }} is required.

project.alreadyRestarting: Restart cancelled: {{ projectName }} is already restarting.
project.restartSuccess: Finished restarting {{ projectName }} in {{ startMode }} mode.
project.restartFailure: Failed to restart {{ projectName }} in {{ startMode }} mode.
project.restartFailureWithReason: Failed to restart {{ projectName }} in {{ startMode }} mode: {{ reason }}.
project.restartFailedReasonDebugFailure: attaching the debugger failed. Try attaching the debugger again
project.restartFailedReasonTimeout: failed to restart within {{ timeoutS }} seconds

openInBrowserCmd.canOnlyOpenStartedProjects: You can only open projects that are Started in the browser.
openInBrowserCmd.failedDetermineAppUrl: Could not determine application URL for {{ projectName }}.
openInBrowserCmd.cantOpenDisconnected: This connection is Disconnected. You cannot open Microclimate if it is not running.

openLogCmd.noLogsForDisabled: Application Logs are not available for Disabled projects.
openLogCmd.projectIsNotStarted: {{ projectName }} is {{ projectState }}; it might not have any application log output until it starts.
openLogCmd.noBuildLogsForType: Build logs are not available for {{ projectType }} projects.
